verses.verse: And there was given <WG1325> me a measuring <WG2563> rod <WG2563> like <WG3664> a staff; <WG4464> and someone said, <WG3004> "Rise <WG1453> and measure <WG3354> the temple <WG3485> of God, <WG2316> and the altar, <WG2379> and those <WG3588> who worship <WG4352> in it.

"And leave <WG1544> out the court <WG833> which is outside <WG1855> the temple, <WG3485> and do not measure <WG3354> it, for it has been given <WG1325> to the nations; <WG1484> and they will tread <WG3961> under <WG3961> foot <WG3961> the holy <WG40> city <WG4172> for forty-two months. <WG3376>

"And I will grant <WG1325> [authority] to my two <WG1417> witnesses, <WG3144> and they will prophesy <WG4395> for twelve <WG5507> <WG1250> hundred <WG5507> <WG1250> and sixty <WG1835> days, <WG2250> clothed <WG4016> in sackcloth. <WG4526>"
These <WG3778> are the two <WG1417> olive <WG1636> trees <WG1636> and the two <WG1417> lampstands <WG3087> that stand <WG2476> before <WG1799> the Lord <WG2962> of the earth. <WG1093>

And if <WG1487> anyone <WG5100> desires <WG2309> to harm <WG91> them, fire <WG4442> proceeds <WG1607> out of their mouth <WG4750> and devours <WG2719> their enemies; <WG2190> and if <WG1487> anyone <WG5100> would desire <WG2309> to harm <WG91> them, in this <WG3779> manner <WG3779> he must <WG1163> be killed. <WG615>

These <WG3778> have <WG2192> the power <WG1849> to shut <WG2808> up the sky, <WG3772> in order <WG2443> that rain <WG5205> may not fall <WG1026> during the days <WG2250> of their prophesying; <WG4394> and they have <WG2192> power <WG1849> over <WG1909> the waters <WG5204> to turn <WG4762> them into blood, <WG129> and to smite <WG3960> the earth <WG1093> with every <WG3956> plague, <WG4127> as often <WG3740> as they desire. <WG2309>

And when <WG3752> they have finished <WG5055> their testimony, <WG3141> the beast <WG2342> that comes <WG305> up out of the abyss <WG12> will make <WG4160> war <WG4171> with them, and overcome <WG3528> them and kill <WG615> them.

And their dead <WG4430> bodies <WG4430> [will lie] in the street <WG4116> of the great <WG3173> city <WG4172> which <WG3748> mystically <WG4153> is called <WG2564> Sodom <WG4670> and Egypt, <WG125> where <WG3699> also <WG2532> their Lord <WG2962> was crucified. <WG4717>

And those from the peoples <WG2992> and tribes <WG5443> and tongues <WG1100> and nations <WG1484> [will] look <WG991> at their dead <WG4430> bodies <WG4430> for three <WG5140> and a half <WG2255> days, <WG2250> and will not permit <WG863> their dead <WG4430> bodies <WG4430> to be laid <WG5087> in a tomb. <WG3418>

And those <WG3588> who dwell <WG2730> on the earth <WG1093> [will] rejoice <WG5463> over <WG1909> them and make <WG2165> merry; <WG2165> and they will send <WG3992> gifts <WG1435> to one <WG240> another, <WG240> because <WG3754> these <WG3778> two <WG1417> prophets <WG4396> tormented <WG928> those <WG3588> who dwell <WG2730> on the earth. <WG1093>

And after <WG3326> the three <WG5140> and a half <WG2255> days <WG2250> the breath <WG4151> of life <WG2222> from God <WG2316> came <WG1525> into them, and they stood <WG2476> on their feet; <WG4228> and great <WG3173> fear <WG5401> fell <WG1968> upon those <WG3588> who were beholding <WG2334> them.

And they heard <WG191> a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456> from heaven <WG3772> saying <WG3004> to them, "Come <WG305> up here. <WG5602>" And they went <WG305> up into heaven <WG3772> in the cloud, <WG3507> and their enemies <WG2190> beheld <WG2334> them.

And in that hour <WG5610> there was a great <WG3173> earthquake, <WG4578> and a tenth <WG1182> of the city <WG4172> fell; <WG4098> and seven <WG2033> thousand <WG5505> people <WG3686> <WG444> were killed <WG615> in the earthquake, <WG4578> and the rest <WG3062> were terrified <WG1719> and gave <WG1325> glory <WG1391> to the God <WG2316> of heaven. <WG3772>
The second <WG1208> woe <WG3759> is past; <WG565> behold, <WG2400> the third <WG5154> woe <WG3759> is coming <WG2064> quickly. <WG5035>

And the seventh <WG1442> angel <WG32> sounded; <WG4537> and there arose <WG1096> loud <WG3173> voices <WG5456> in heaven, <WG3772> saying, <WG3004> "The kingdom <WG932> of the world <WG2889> has become <WG1096> [the kingdom] of our Lord, <WG2962> and of His Christ; <WG5547> and He will reign <WG936> forever <WG165> and ever. <WG165>"
And the twenty-four elders, <WG4245> who sit <WG2521> on their thrones <WG2362> before <WG1799> God, <WG2316> fell <WG4098> on their faces <WG4383> and worshiped <WG4352> God, <WG2316>

saying, <WG3004> "We give <WG2168> Thee thanks, <WG2168> O Lord <WG2962> God, <WG2316> the Almighty, <WG3841> who art <WG1510> and who <WG3588> wast, <WG1510> because <WG3754> Thou hast taken <WG2983> Thy great <WG3173> power <WG1411> and hast begun to reign. <WG936>

"And the nations <WG1484> were enraged, <WG3710> and Thy wrath <WG3709> came, <WG2064> and the time <WG2540> [came] for the dead <WG3498> to be judged, <WG2919> and [the time] to give <WG1325> their reward <WG3408> to Thy bond-servants the prophets <WG4396> and to the saints <WG40> and to those <WG3588> who fear <WG5399> Thy name, <WG3686> the small <WG3398> and the great, <WG3173> and to destroy <WG1311> those <WG3588> who destroy <WG1311> the earth. <WG1093>"

And the temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316> which is in heaven <WG3772> was opened; <WG455> and the ark <WG2787> of His covenant <WG1242> appeared <WG3708> in His temple, <WG3485> and there were flashes <WG796> of lightning <WG796> and sounds <WG5456> and peals <WG1027> of thunder <WG1027> and an earthquake <WG4578> and a great <WG3173> hailstorm. <WG5464>
